snippet: Payroll tax talks are testing the reputation of Senator Jon Kyl of Arizona as a top Republican negotiator before retirement.
abstract: Sen Jon Kyl of Arizona is undergoing a final trial as a Republican negotiator in talks with Democrats to keep alive a two-percentage-point payroll tax cut he helped create in 2010; observers say Kyl's legacy as a master deal-maker is at stake in the current talks; Kyl is scheduled to retire in January, 2013.
lead_paragraph: Payroll tax talks are testing the reputation of Senator Jon Kyl of Arizona as a top Republican negotiator before retirement.

headline.seo: Payroll Tax Talks Offer Kyl One Last Stand in the Crossfire
headline.main: For Kyl, One Last Stand in the Crossfire
headline.print_headline: For Kyl, One Last Stand in the Crossfire

keywords.value: Joint Select Committee on Deficit Reduction
